Text:
this animated film was voted as "best animated film of all time" by asifa (world main animation association). i can't say it's "the best", but one of finest moments in animation for sure...although i already have this, thanks for the upload

be sure to check "hedgehog in the fog", also by yuri norstein - http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3361110
Please seed. There's a bunch of us stuck at 98.3 :(
Great film, but there's a 301MB 640x480 version floating around, which is no doubt better quality than this.
